alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 1:29PM CDT until October 04 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Central Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 129 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Goodlett, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quanah, Eldorado, Odell, and Goodlett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
